original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1291)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1386)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>22</color> 秒內產生一排山岳阻擋敵方。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1291)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1386)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy in the front, and within <color=#ccffcc>22</color> a row of mountains is generated to block the enemy.
